name: df-abs
body: |- wceq(cabs, cmpt(s0, cc, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(s0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(s0))))))
comment: Define the function for the absolute value (modulus) of a complex number. See ~ abscli for its closure and ~ absval or ~ absval2i for its value. For example, ` ( abs `` -u 2 ) = 2 ` ( ~ ex-abs ). (Contributed by NM, 27-Jul-1999.)
